downloadTitle: BizTalk Server 2010 ESB Toolkit Architecture Poster
downloadDescription: This poster depicts the architecture of the BizTalk Server 2010 ESB Toolkit. It shows the toolkit's core components, and how these integrate with BizTalk Server.

downloadFile.name: BizTalk Server 2010 ESB Toolkit Architecture Poster.pdf

detailsSection: This poster depicts the architecture of the BizTalk ESB Toolkit. It shows the toolkit's core components, and how these integrate with BizTalk Server. The poster is intended to be printed, and measures 26”x28”.
detailsSection_file_name: BizTalk Server 2010 ESB Toolkit Architecture Poster.pdf
installInstructionSection:
1. Before you click Download, you must configure the Adobe Reader to not open a PDF file in your browser. To do this:
    1. Open Adobe Reader.
    2. On the Edit menu, click Preferences.
    3. Under Categories, select Internet.
    4. Clear the Display PDF in browser option.
    5. Click OK.
    6. Close Adobe Reader.
  2. To start the download, click the Download button to start the download.

  3. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
